body: It's interesting how other libs and langs handle this ugly issue gracefully. I've tried: curl, objective-c, nodejs, php, and openssl s_client and they all seem to be parsing the the cert without strictly validating the strings. I can easily change the encoding type in the binary blob from `0x13` to `0x0c` but that will change the cert signature and decryption of data will fail at a later point. Any ideas?
